overview:
Job Description: Maintenance of vendor relations for corporate nationwide product offerings for both voice and data services. Management of Leased Cost Routing Tools, creation and analysis of monthly COGS reporting to identify trending and cost savings initiatives. Tracking of ICB requests from Sales to ensure target rates and response time intervals are met. Coordinate and document Vendor meetings Establish processes in an effort to streamline vendor management functions, trouble reporting procedures, and the collection of current data from vendors including Contact and Escalation lists. Creation and maintenance of contract database

Company Description Broadview Networks is a network-based business communications provider serving customers nationwide. Broadview provides the total solution for business communications including local and long distance voice communications; premises-based and patented hosted VoIP systems; data services encompassing VPN- and MPLS-enabled applications; traditional telephone hardware; high-speed Internet services; a full suite of managed services; and a range of professional services. Broadview customers benefit from award-winning customer service including a web-based account management tool and a primary point-of-contact for real-time, personal customer care.
